[h1] After all these years, still an outstanding game. [/h1]

I have played this game before I played the perevious one, which was a bad decision. NEVER PLAY PORTAL 2 BEFORE PORTAL ONE. Looking at how old this game is, it is still very impressive about how many people are still playing the game right now. 

This game's story is outstanding. In the first game, the story was very mysterious. For example, when you start Portal 1 for the first time, you start to ask many questions, for example: Why do I wake up in this glass box? etc. But, the reason this story is a masterpiece is because the second game answers some of those questions, but in a way so that it creates more questions. This is why people have been nagging for a third game for years.

There are a few things I like about the game...

1. Great Story. Not only do I like the plots in the story and the unexpected turns of events (like escaping with Wheatley) but it's also hilarious, especially when attempting some of the achievements.
2. It gets you thinking. Though I wouldn't recommend the game to anyone who get severe motion sickness (for obvious reasons beyond Valve's control), it's a good puzzle game. You really have to think how you would complete the level.
3. Co-op. If solving a level is too easy in your opinion (though I kinda doubt it in some levels) then try solving a level with a friend. It's a lot more challanging. Also, you can gesture to your partner which is also good at getting certain achievements and getting GLADoS ticked off which is absolutely HILARIOUS!!!!
4. Steam Workshop integration. You have the ability to play maps made by the community which can be a good way to solve some new challanges.
5. Very good graphics dispite it being a 7 year old game.
6. Has a level editor found in the "Community Test Chambers" button. It's always cool to create your own levels!

Last of all, I really love Wheatley's accent. (And Iskall85 does a good impression of it. Find an example in Hermitcraft 6).

Just one minor downside: It can be very easy to get bored of the game once you complete the game (the reason a lot of people have around 10 hours of play time) because the main story mode doesn't go on forever and then gets a bit more difficult to enjoy which means people get bored of it and play something else. Valve have actually tried to prevent that sort of thing with co-op, achievements, a level editor and Steam Workshop Integration. But, I've been playing co-op one time and been designing a level another time and have really been enjoying playing it :) I encourage you random guy reading my review to do the same.

I definitely recommend the game dispite that downside. Even more so on a sale!

Sensacional!

Portal Lady goes to sleep after eating her cake and wakes up in 2011 to find out that her memes got destroyed due to overuse, which got her so depressed that she thought the best way to commit soduko was by sleeping on her meme grave. 
 
Fast forward a few thousand years later, a "Tea-Drinking British Robot Testicle" fellow gets mad after finding out that there's still a stinky human roaming around on the meme grave. He was ready to kill such human by gassing up the room, but gets shocked by the fact that such human was the same one that killed his lame "Duck-Roll" meme back in the early days of 4chins and replacing it with an 80's song. (Spoiler Alert: In Portal 3 it is revealed that he was the one behind the "Gnome'd" meme made in an attempt to recover his meme-position. Sadly, his meme didn't get popular until a few years later after the disappearance of Portal Lady) 
 
He knew that gassing her wasn't a very good-enough punishment for such cruel meme-killer, so he decides to pretend to be all friendly with the last surviving human from the final Fallout so he could get her to fall on the Rick Roll room to punish this beast by making her listen to the meme that she used to destroy the Duck-Roll meme for the rest of eternity. 
 
Little did he know that the Robot Lady from the first game has been waiting for the both of them pretending to be dead. But in reality, she was eating a diet of the meme that Portal SIut created back in 2007 so she could somehow turn it into Carbon Dioxide as a weird and fetishy punishment for such "sh¡tty" meme. (Get it? "Sh¡tty"? haha... Only one person is gonna laugh at that crappy joke...) 
 
Yatta Yatta Yatta, fast forward after a few Shenanigans and portally adventures, when she thought it was finally time to finish this monster of a creature, she finds that both the British testicle and the cake lady destroyed her Carbon Dioxide capsule, which got her so depressed that she decided that the only solution left was to just kill her in a generic way, but that plan also failed; and she got her head Rip and Tear'd by them two. Cake Lady was getting ready to go back to the outside world where she could create and destroy so many memes again like she did back in her golden age of memery, but the British Testicle was ready to bamboozle her by stopping the capsule right there and playing such song from the 80's, but failed miserably after the robot lady tricked him into destroying the capsule as she felt that being meme'd on a potato was just too Humiliating for her. 
 
Yatta Yatta, Cake B¡tch and Robot SIut watch a few episodes from the old meme show about Artificially colored ponies that talk about friendship and do magical tricks all day. They both realize that indeed; Friendship is Magic™, and they both decide that being virgins was so 2011, so they instead decided to become lesbians. And so they planned to get rid of the last males in existence by sending them into space for all of eternity, and they succeed in doing so.  
 
and just when we thought that we were gonna have a happy ending in which they both become lesbian couple, Robot SIut gets socially anxious about being in love with the one and only human left in the entire world because she fears that she'll end up getting neglected and feel sadness for the rest of her life. So instead, she decides that it's better if she sent Pie Lesbian into the outside world where she can find all the dead memes left within history and destroy them all by making them more obnoxious, and never see her again. 
 
The end. (´･ω･`)
Muy buen juego, si te gustó el Portal 1, te gustará el 2. Lo recomiendo :)

Portal 2 is a really great game. The story was great, the characters were awesome, and the levels were fantastic. It never felt like it was frustrating me, or making me feel like i'm an idiot, even with GLaDOS's sarcastic comments taunting you. Whenever I finished a level, I felt like I had accomplished a minor achievement, and it excited me for the next level, over, and over again. The main story itself is around 3-4 hours long, and even though it is a really amazing component, the level creation system and the community levels were the main reason why i love this game. Some people are really talented, and users have made countless concepts and puzzles, giving me and my friends something to enjoy while we attempt to solve the newest puzzle thrown at us. The Cooperative story was a fun experience to share with me and my friends, giving us 2-3 hours of fun and challenging Portal levels. With all of these aspects combined, I can't stop coming back to this game. 

I give this a 9.5/10

The sequel to Portal 1, Portal 2 is definitely a major improvement. The content, challenges, and story is increased a large amount, and it definitely is much more humorous than the previous game.

Pros:
-Not too challenging, nor too easy
-Humor and story; characters are memorable
-Co-op
-Graphics and visuals are great

Cons:
-A few minor bugs
-Time between death and loading is a bit lengthy

Portal 2 jest kontynuacją pierwszej część Portal. Gra głównie należy do klasyki gatunku. Rozgrywka jest przyjemna, gra logiczna która nie jest aż tak trudna, chociaż trudniejsza od pierwszej część. Soundtrack generalnie nie ma. Grafika jest Bardzo dobra, dopracowana i przyjemna. Warto też wspomnieć, iż zarys fabuły jest ogromny. Oceniam grę Portal 2 na 7/10. 
Nie ma większych rewelacji. Polecam :)

传送门两部都玩了，神作！
各种高耸入云的工业建筑群给人震撼的视体验，还有解谜也是脑洞大开。
剧情跌宕起伏，最后主角中陷阱被炸飞，没死，爬起来回身一枪，给我看麻了，天秀！
结尾还有一代的彩蛋，我们的好朋友爱心方块，好评！
和默契的朋友玩，你会发现物理的美妙；而和坑比一起玩，你会发现你有多讨厌人类。
双人模式随机匹配到的人都挺好的，基友不在的时候想玩双人模式也没问题。推荐！！(oﾟvﾟ)ノ
